articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from first practice and sprint qualifying at the Austrian Grand Prix.

articles.description: Euro 2024 latest as Phil Foden returns to England camp after the birth of his child, plus build-up to the last 16 of the tournament.

articles.description: An up-and-down T20 World Cup means questions about England's hierarchy have not been answered and doubts remain about the future, writes Matthew Henry.

articles.description: Antonin Panenka's penalty in the Euro 1976 final birthed a whole new 12-yard tactic. But the risks were higher than anyone could imagine.
articles.title: Antonin Panenka: The Euro 1976 penalty that killed a career and birthed a feud

articles.description: The US Soccer Federation condemns the online racial abuse suffered by many of its players following a 2-1 defeat by Panama.

articles.description: British swimmer Archie Goodburn reveals he has been diagnosed with inoperable brain tumours.

articles.description: England defender Ezri Konsa says the families of players were hit by beer cups after their goalless draw with Slovenia.
articles.title: England families 'hit' by beer cups 'from all angles' after Euro 2024 draw with Slovenia
